statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, age,user_id FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE age > 30
SELECT gender, location FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase'
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE gender = 'female' AND age < 40
SELECT location, count(*) AS total_behavior FROM CustomerBehaviorData GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_behavior DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS num_users FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE user_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003)
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM CustomerBehaviorData ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%click%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM user_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, s.segment_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN user_segments s ON c.customer_id = s.segment_id WHERE s.segment_id = 1 ORDER BY c.last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, s.segment_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN user_segments s ON c.customer_id = s.segment_id WHERE s.segment_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, birthdate FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT segment_name, customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, purchase_date, amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT c.name, p.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, cs.segment_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, phone FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@yahoo.com%' ORDER BY name ASC, phone DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'M%' OR email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%son%' AND phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount, product_id FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
